date: Mon Mar 28 2022 21:26:02 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: CODA is the first time a streaming movie has been nominated for a best director award. The award was awarded to the first female director of a film that was nominated for the best film of the year. The film is based on the work of Oscar-winning director LZ Granderson, who won the award for best director of the film, LZ.
metaDescription: See an AI generated artwork by the A.I. BarDroid about CODA which is the first time a streaming movie has been nominated for a best director award.

topicText:
'CODA' wins Oscar for best picture
The win for deaf family drama 'CODA' marks the first time a streaming service took Hollywood's biggest prize.
Apple TV Plus' CODA is the first streaming movie to win Best Picture ...
With its big win at the 2022 Oscars, Apple TV Plus' CODA did what a slew of Netflix movies could not.
How CODA managed to pull out a Best Picture win
The family drama is a hugely unlikely Best Picture winner. But it sort of makes sense.
Apple's Oscar-winner CODA brings you into an inner world of sign
The film, about a hearing teen in a Deaf family, showcases how sign language can be visual poetry -- as raunchy as a limerick, as sublime as a sonnet.
CODA has won best picture at the Academy awards but it was Will ...
The film, a story about a deaf family with just one hearing member, won in all three categories it was nominated in. Troy Kotsur won the Oscar for Best Actor inÂ ...
2022 Oscar Winners: 'CODA', 'Dune' and Will Smith
Follow the latest news updates from the Oscars 2022. The 94th Academy Awards were held on Sunday night at the Dolby Theater in Hollywood.
